short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a bookmark button to Bluesky posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a long requested bookmark button to posts on Bluesky. You can click the button to locally save the post into a viewer where you can browse through all of your bookmarked posts.
